scripts.copy-assets: copyfiles -f img/* dist/img/ && copyfiles -f css/* dist/css/
scripts.prebuild: npm run clean && npm run make-dirs
scripts.build: npm run copy-html && npm run copy-assets && npm run minify-js && npm run minify-css
scripts.minify-js: uglifyjs script.js -o dist/js/script.min.js && uglifyjs js/config.js -o dist/js/config.min.js
scripts.deploy: npm run build && npm run optimize-images
